participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Sociable and laid-back, enjoys casual interactions and the gym atmosphere.
participant_1.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Sara
participant_2.personality: Caring and nurturing, loves family and animals, often finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i've one brother. i live in alabama. i love dogs. i've three sisters. i like tacos.
